dict.acceptation: 边缘，范围；极限；利润，盈余；（版心外）的空白；
留边；成为…的边；加边于，围绕；为…加旁注；

sent.orig: The margin of business enterprise can is divided into ownership share margin and obligation margin.
sent.trans: 企业的融资可分为股权融资和债务融资。

sent.orig: White space around image area of a page margin, head margin, foredgemargin and foot margin respectively.
sent.trans: 页内围绕印纹面积的空白位。分别为内白边，头白边，外白边和脚白边。

sent.orig: Collateral securities obtained in connection with customer margin purchases margin purchase and short sale business.
sent.trans: 办理有价证券买卖融资融券业务取得之融资买进担保证券。

sent.orig: Future gross margin, net interest margin will continue to maintain a high level.
sent.trans: 未来毛利率、净利率仍将维持较高水平。

sent.orig: Margin: Also sign Margin Agreement below.
sent.trans: 融资融券：并请签署下文融资融券合约。
